name: Valley View Steel Utility Stakes (4-Pack)
description: Valley View Industries Metal Stakes (4-Pack) are 9 in. galvanized steel stakes for use with all Valley View lawn edgings and brick and paver edgings. These utility stakes can also be used for many other purposes. It is recommended that anchor stakes are used every five feet on designs that have the edging in straight lengths. Where there are curved designs for edgings, additional anchor stakes are recommended at the curve points. Anchor stakes should be staked in at a 45 degree angle. Gloves and eye protection are recommended.Can be used with all valley View lawn edgings and brick/ paver edgingsUtility stakes can be used for many purposesGalvanized steel for strength9 in. lengthPriced competitively yet provides much more value in product
